org.net4care.forwarder

Interface DataUploader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardDataUploader

    public interface DataUploader
    An instance of DataUploader is responsible for forwarding/sending/uploading a StandardTeleObservation instance from the home device to the Net4Care server side. It also provides a query interface that allows queries to be sent to the server for the set of observations satisfying a given query. Acts as the 'Forwarder' role of the Forwarder-Receiver pattern, POSA 1 p. 307.
    Author:
    Henrik Baerbak Christensen, Aarhus University

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QueryResult query(Query query)
      Query for a set of observations satisfying certain criteria.
      FutureResult upload(StandardTeleObservation sto)
      Upload an observation to the Net4Care server side for storage.

    • Method Detail

      • upload

        FutureResult upload(StandardTeleObservation sto)
                    throws IOException
        Upload an observation to the Net4Care server side for storage. Precondition: sto is non-null and valid.
        Parameters:
        sto - the observation to upload.
        Returns:
        a FutureResult that is a future containing the result of the transmission (fail/success).
        Throws:
        IOException

      • query

        QueryResult query(Query query)
                  throws IOException,
                         Net4CareException
        Query for a set of observations satisfying certain criteria.
        Parameters:
        query - An instance of one of the concrete classes defined in the 'query' subpackage, that allows you to define search criteria on CPR, time interval, etc.
        Returns:
        the result of the query which is a future that when 'isSuccess()' is true can be accessed to retrieve a set of StandardTeleObservation's.
        Throws:
        IOException
        Net4CareException
        UnknownCPRException
